title: Dento Center
description: Created a patient portal for Dento Center, empowering patients to access their dental records, view upcoming appointments, and communicate securely with the clinic. Developed using ASP.NET MVC and incorporated responsive design principles for optimal usability across devices. Implemented features such as online appointment requests, secure messaging, and educational resources for oral health. The patient portal enhanced patient engagement, communication, and convenience, resulting in improved patient satisfaction.

title: MyWay CRM
description: Developed a comprehensive SaaS-based CRM tailored for a travel agency, featuring distinct dashboards and permissions for roles including Super Admin, Admin, HR, Accountants, and Sales. The system facilitates ticket and flight bookings, lead management, and integrates a standalone call center module. With integrated payment processing, it streamlines operations, enhancing efficiency and user experience across all departments.

title: TN PRO
description: TN Pro is an advanced project management solution akin to Jira, designed to enhance team collaboration and streamline workflows. It offers robust features including video and audio calling, as well as integrated chat functionality, enabling seamless communication among team members. With tools for task assignment, progress tracking, and real-time updates, TN Pro ensures efficient project execution and fosters a cohesive work environment.

title: GitHub Codespaces and github.dev
description: Video interview to explain when to use GitHub.dev versus GitHub Codespaces, and how best to use each tool.
